mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FF.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT TP.PROFCODE, TP.TMEMBERNAME, TO_CHAR(SUM(TP.MONEY),'9,999,999,999,999,999') MONEY, TO_CHAR(SUM((TP.ALLOWANCE-((TP.ALLOWANCE*0.03)+(TP.ALLOWANCE*0.01)-(TP.COMMITION))) - (TP.REFUNDALLOWANCE-((TP.REFUNDALLOWANCE*0.03)+(TP.REFUNDALLOWANCE*0.01))) ),'9,999,999,999,999,999') ALLOWANCE, TO_CHAR(COUNT(DECODE(TP.REFUNDAMOUNT,0,1)),'9,999,999,999,999,999') CNT FROM ( SELECT AA.TMEMBERNAME , AA.PROFCODE , -- 강사코드 AA.USER_NM , AA.EXAMTYPE , TO_CHAR(AA.REG_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REG_DT, (AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) MONEY , AA.PROPERCENT , AA.PAYMENTTYPE, AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , ROUND(((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100)) , 0) ) COMMITION , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)- AA.PAYMENTPETCENT) , 0) , ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) , 0) ) ALLOWANCE , (((NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-(((NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) REFUNDALLOWANCE , NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) REFUNDAMOUNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_PRF WHERE USER_ID = C.PROFCODE) AS TMEMBERNAME ,-- 강사이름 A.IDENTYID , -- 응시번호 D.REG_DT, (SELECT EXAMCOST FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) AS MONEY , C.FEE_PROF AS PROPERCENT, (SELECT MOCKNAME FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) MOCKNAME , -- 모의고사명 (SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT WHERE IDENTYID=A.IDENTYID) SUBJECTCNT, -- 모의고사 과목수 A.USER_NM , -- 응시자이름 A.RECEIPTTYPE, DECODE(A.EXAMTYPE, '0', '온라인', '1', '오프라인') EXAMTYPE , DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0', '카드', '1', '현금' , '2', '계좌이체' , '3', '가상계좌') PAYMENTTYPE , D.PAYMENTTYPE ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(A.RECEIPTTYPE ,'0' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDONCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '1' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '2' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) ) PAYMENTPETCENT, C.ITEMID , -- 문제은행구분번호 C.PROFCODE, -- 강사코드 D.TID -- 결제거래번호 FROM TB_TORDERS A , TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT B , TB_TITEM C , TB_TAPPROVALS D WHERE A.IDENTYID = B.IDENTYID AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.ITEMID = C.ITEMID AND A.IDENTYID = D.IDENTYID ) AA LEFT JOIN TB_TREFUND BB ON AA.TID = BB.TID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.REG_DT >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHSDATE},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND AA.REG_DT <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHEDATE},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND TMEMBERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
ORDER BY AA.REG_DT )TP GROUP BY TP.TMEMBERNAME , TP.PROFCODE ) FF WHERE rownum <= #{endNo} ) WHERE rnum > #{startNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_PRF WHERE USER_ID = C.PROFCODE) AS TMEMBERNAME ,-- 강사이름 A.IDENTYID , -- 응시번호 D.REG_DT, (SELECT EXAMCOST FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) AS MONEY , 50 AS PROPERCENT, (SELECT MOCKNAME FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) MOCKNAME , -- 모의고사명 (SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT WHERE IDENTYID=A.IDENTYID) SUBJECTCNT, -- 모의고사 과목수 A.USER_NM , -- 응시자이름 A.RECEIPTTYPE, DECODE(A.EXAMTYPE, '0', '온라인', '1', '오프라인') EXAMTYPE , DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0', '카드', '1', '현금' , '2', '계좌이체' , '3', '가상계좌') PAYMENTTYPE , D.PAYMENTTYPE ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(A.RECEIPTTYPE ,'0' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDONCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '1' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '2' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) ) PAYMENTPETCENT, C.ITEMID , -- 문제은행구분번호 C.PROFCODE, -- 강사코드 D.TID -- 결제거래번호 FROM TB_TORDERS A , TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT B , TB_TITEM C , TB_TAPPROVALS D WHERE A.IDENTYID = B.IDENTYID AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.ITEMID = C.ITEMID AND A.IDENTYID = D.IDENTYID ) AA LEFT JOIN TB_TREFUND BB ON AA.TID = BB.TID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.REG_DT >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHSDATE},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND AA.REG_DT <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHEDATE},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND AA.TMEMBERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
ORDER BY AA.REG_DT )TP WHERE 1 =1
AND TMEMBERNAME LIKE '%'||#{SEARCHTEXT}||'%'
GROUP BY TP.TMEMBERNAME , TP.PROFCODE )

SELECT AA.TMEMBERNAME , AA.PROFCODE , CONCAT(AA.USER_NM|| '/' ,AA.USER_ID ) AS USRNAMEID , AA.EXAMTYPE , AA.MOCKNAME , TO_CHAR(AA.REG_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REG_DT , ROUND((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) , 0) MONEY , CONCAT(AA.PAYMENTTYPE|| '/' ,AA.PAYMENTPETCENT ) AS PAYMENTPARAM , AA.PAYMENTTYPE , AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , ROUND(((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100)) , 0) ) COMMITION , AA.PROPERCENT , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)- AA.PAYMENTPETCENT) , 0) , ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) , 0) ) ALLOWANCE , ROUND((((NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-(((NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) , 0) REFUNDALLOWANCE , NVL2(BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,BB.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) REFUNDAMOUNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_PRF WHERE USER_ID = C.PROFCODE) AS TMEMBERNAME ,-- 강사이름 A.IDENTYID , -- 응시번호 D.REG_DT, (SELECT EXAMCOST FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) AS MONEY , C.FEE_PROF AS PROPERCENT, (SELECT MOCKNAME FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) MOCKNAME , -- 모의고사명 (SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT WHERE IDENTYID=A.IDENTYID) SUBJECTCNT, -- 모의고사 과목수 A.USER_NM , -- 응시자이름 A.USER_ID , A.RECEIPTTYPE, DECODE(A.EXAMTYPE, '0', '온라인', '1', '오프라인') EXAMTYPE , DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0', '카드', '1', '현금' , '2', '계좌이체' , '3', '가상계좌') PAYMENTTYPE , D.PAYMENTTYPE ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(A.RECEIPTTYPE ,'0' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDONCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '1' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '2' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) ) PAYMENTPETCENT, C.ITEMID , -- 문제은행구분번호 C.PROFCODE, -- 강사코드 D.TID -- 결제거래번호 FROM TB_TORDERS A , TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT B , TB_TITEM C , TB_TAPPROVALS D WHERE A.IDENTYID = B.IDENTYID AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.ITEMID = C.ITEMID AND A.IDENTYID = D.IDENTYID
AND D.REG_DT >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHSDATE},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND D.REG_DT <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHEDATE},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND C.PROFCODE=#{PROFCODE} ) AA LEFT JOIN TB_TREFUND BB ON AA.TID = BB.TID ORDER BY AA.REG_DT

SELECT AA.TMEMBERNAME , AA.PROFCODE , -- 강사코드 AA.USER_NM , AA.IDENTYID , AA.TID , CONCAT(AA.USER_NM|| '/' ,AA.USER_ID ) AS USRNAMEID , AA.EXAMTYPE , AA.MOCKNAME , TO_CHAR(AA.REG_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) REG_DT, ROUND((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT) ,0)*-1 MONEY , AA.PROPERCENT , CONCAT(AA.PAYMENTTYPE|| '/' ,AA.PAYMENTPETCENT ) AS PAYMENTPARAM , AA.PAYMENTTYPE, AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', AA.PAYMENTPETCENT , ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100)) , 0) )*-1 COMMITION , DECODE(AA.ORIPAYMENTTYPE, '3', ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)- AA.PAYMENTPETCENT) , 0) , ROUND((((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-(((AA.MONEY / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) , 0) )*-1 ALLOWANCE , ROUND((((NVL2(AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100)-(((NVL2(AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) / AA.SUBJECTCNT)*AA.PROPERCENT/100) * (AA.PAYMENTPETCENT/100))) , 0) REFUNDALLOWANCE , NVL2(AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,AA.REFUNDAMOUNT ,0) REFUNDAMOUNT FROM ( SELECT (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_MA_MEMBER_PRF WHERE USER_ID = C.PROFCODE) AS TMEMBERNAME ,-- 강사이름 A.IDENTYID , -- 응시번호 D.REG_DT, (SELECT EXAMCOST FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) AS MONEY , C.FEE_PROF AS PROPERCENT, (SELECT MOCKNAME FROM TB_TMOCKREGISTRATION WHERE MOCKCODE= A.EXAMCODE) MOCKNAME , -- 모의고사명 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT WHERE IDENTYID=A.IDENTYID) SUBJECTCNT, -- 모의고사 과목수 A.USER_NM , -- 응시자이름 A.USER_ID , A.RECEIPTTYPE, DECODE(A.EXAMTYPE, '0', '온라인', '1', '오프라인') EXAMTYPE , DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0', '카드', '1', '현금' , '2', '계좌이체' , '3', '가상계좌') PAYMENTTYPE , D.PAYMENTTYPE ORIPAYMENTTYPE , DECODE(A.RECEIPTTYPE ,'0' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDONCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '1' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) , '2' ,DECODE(D.PAYMENTTYPE, '0' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'CARDOFFCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '1' , 0 , '2' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'REALTIMECHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE'), '3' , (SELECT CODE_VAL FROM TB_BA_CONFIG_CD WHERE CODE_CD = 'VACCOUNTCHARGE' AND SYS_CD = 'PAYMENTCHARGE') ) ) PAYMENTPETCENT, C.ITEMID , -- 문제은행구분번호 C.PROFCODE, -- 강사코드 D.TID , -- 결제거래번호 F.REFUNDAMOUNT FROM TB_TORDERS A , TB_TUSERCHOICESUBJECT B ,TB_TITEM C , TB_TAPPROVALS D , TB_TREFUND F WHERE A.IDENTYID = B.IDENTYID AND A.ORDERNO = B.ORDERNO AND B.ITEMID = C.ITEMID AND A.IDENTYID = D.IDENTYID AND D.TID = F.TID
AND D.REG_DT >= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHSDATE},' 00:00:00'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND D.REG_DT <= TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{SEARCHEDATE},' 23:59:59'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND C.PROFCODE=#{PROFCODE} ) AA ORDER BY AA.REG_DT
